For more than 10 years, some Basecamp employees maintained an open list of customer names that sounded ‚Äúfunny‚Äù to them.

Last year, amid a broader reckoning over diversity and inclusion, that list didn‚Äôt seem quite so funny any more. And employees wanted to talk about it.

Wow‚Äîjust found out that Tailwind has composable transform classes. I naturally assumed this wasn't possible, but they pulled it off using CSS custom properties ü§Ø

How? The ".transform" class sets *every* transform property from CSS vars‚Äîall the other classes just set a variable. https://t.co/nfwnIWYKCh

I think folks misunderstand me when I say: "pick your market first."

‚ùå "Market" = "A group I'd like to sell to." ‚úÖ "Market" = "A category where people are currently spending $."

Example: "The global diamond market is currently $82 billion USD."
